wikipedia_page.main: Leslie Thomas Farrer (22 December 1922 – 16 November 2017) was an English footballer who represented Great Britain at the 1956 Summer Olympics. Farrer played as an amateur for Bishop Auckland and Walthamstow Avenue. Farrer died in November 2017 at the age of 94.

response: * November 2017: Tommy Farrer, 94, Great Britain Olympic footballer.
